definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.

sentences.english: You can also export the test classes to run in Integration Edition.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以導出測試類以便在集成版中運行它們。

sentences.chinese: 然後進一步提出這幾種組織集成的具體方法。

sentences.english: All parts of the system integrate and interoperate with one another with no issues or problems.
sentences.chinese: 系統的所有部分都將順利地集成在一起並進行互操作。

sentences.english: Tests can then be deployed to the integrated test server and executed.
sentences.chinese: 然後可以將測試部署到集成測試服務器並執行。

sentences.english: The following points are considered in evaluating the maturity of the integration layer.
sentences.chinese: 評估集成層的成熟度時應考慮以下幾點。
緊湊，靈活，高集成度的功率分佈。

sentences.english: The other kind of testing is integration testing.
sentences.chinese: 另外一種測試就是集成測試。

sentences.english: And CAD integrating one to the present hydraulic pressure has very good understanding.

sentences.english: This article introduces the methods of checking integrate circuit module and single crystal transistor.

sentences.english: The integration test client lets you import that data into a business object.

sentences.english: The continuos high book shelf integrates lighting which position can be adjusted to the need.

sentences.english: This system assuring the integration of CIMS information in autobody development.

sentences.english: The EPF project, however, addresses the process integration issue.
sentences.chinese: 然而，EPF項目解決了這個過程集成的問題。

sentences.english: The radar includes a fully integrated Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) interrogator system.
